channel.title: OK i'm realy mad but i need help plz
channel.description: Ok ive tried every thing to make myself admin and my friends mods i have a testscape source and also i can even change the welcome screen it says welcome to tesescape made by nvi ible and i want to change that i tried every thing plz some 1 help?? plz?

@Fr33b1e wrote:

Ok, look at what lines they’re on, and press Ctrl+G and enter the line, go there, and fix them accordingly, for instance EX: If you want to give out range gear when you type ::ranger if it has like 0892 is to big of an integer, change it to 892, and make sure you’re using Mod Taharok’s ‘Perfect Compiler V1.7.’

item.title: OK i'm realy mad but i need help plz
item.dc:creator: @Ice Ice
item.description:
@Ice wrote:

Hi,
I’ve only got two ways too do it. Don’t yell at me if it doesn’t work please.

First, Open up Character folder, Click the Playername.txt, Edit Playerrights, Compile.
Second, Open up Client.java, Search for “Admin = 3” Change the “Admin” To the playersname.

Hope it helps.

Read full topic

item.title: OK i'm realy mad but i need help plz
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

ok finding it for dummy’s , …

search for

[code]PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": has logged in! There is now “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.”;
}

	}[/code]

under the last } you should see something like this :

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“santa”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“modder”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“alister18”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}[/code]

ok take you want some1 to be mod !

then

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("alister18"))

change alister18 to the name lets take yours

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("goodoo dolls"))

then

[code]{
				playerRights = 1; 
			}[/code]

1 = p mod ( silver crown )
2 = admin (gold crown )
3 = owner ( no crown find a tut for that )

Read full topic
